column4: anybody uses mediabuntu? Im having trouble with sound using ffmpe
im not having any sound while producing flv
flv uses mp3 as a sound, did you install ffmpeg from medibuntu?
ffmpeg from default repos is crippled
whats the command that you use to convert?
do you have 'hardy' or did you adjust the guide to jaunty?
did you have ffmpeg installed before you went with medibuntu, if yes you need to purge all ffmpeg-related packages since they dont uninstall automatically when you do sudo apt-get remove ffmpeg
i have hardy. How do i uninstall everything?
just search synaptic for ffmpeg and uninstall all related, ones i remember is libavformat
theres a couple of others named the same way, libavcodec and such
whats the command to search for already installed ffmpeg* packages?
instead of those you need libavcodec-unstripped and all the rest
in synaptic just search for ffmpeg
